content: Just landed in NYC and the skyline is already giving me all the vibes  Can't wait to get back into the job hunt - this time with more wisdom and fewer mistakes!
raw_content: The NYC skyline never fails to inspire. Fresh off the plane, I'm diving straight into job hunting. Time to restart my career with lessons learned from the past.

content: landed a gig at this startup and it's pretty cool! bumping into finance peeps left and right in the city. feels like everything i do is pushing me towards that quant firm goal.  NYC never sleeps, and neither do i.
raw_content: Settled into a temporary job at a tech startup while networking with finance pros. NYC's pulse is a reminder of what's at stake. Every meeting, every code line feels like a step closer to my quant firm dream.

content: just got an internship at this quant firm and the vibes are electric  Been coding non-stop to make an impression, integrating AI into trading algorithms. Every commit feels like progress, like a heartbeat.
raw_content: Landed an internship at the quant firm! The energy here is electric, just like the city. Been coding day and night to prove my worth, synthesizing AI into our trading algorithms. Each commit feels like a heartbeat of progress.
